HediffDef.label: Rebelling
HediffDef.description: Whether by sour mood or mental issues, rebelling means any forced work is met with snide comments and eyerolls, and taken less than seriously.

HediffDef.label: Insomnia
HediffDef.description: Pronounced mental or physical unrest causes insomnia, insomnia means one can often feel sluggish or exhausted and find themselves hardly ever capable of sleep.

HediffDef.label: hyper-coagulant
HediffDef.description: Higher red blood-cell count means hyper-coagulation occurs, causing wounds to bleed much less profusely.

HediffDef.label: hemophilic
HediffDef.description: Hemophilia is the inability for blood to clot properly, causing wounds to bleed much more profusely.
